thread.title: In 2024, Europe purchased a record amount of liquefied natural gas from Russia - 17.8 million tons, which is 2 million tons more than a year earlier

title: In 2024, Europe purchased a record amount of liquefied natural gas from Russia - 17.8 million tons, which is 2 million tons more than a year earlier
text:
In 2024, Europe purchased a record amount of liquefied natural gas from Russia - 17.8 million tons, which is 2 million tons more than a year earlier
In 2024, Europe purchased a record amount of liquefied natural gas from Russia - 17.8 million tons, which is 2 million tons more than a year earlier.
This is reported by Bloomberg with reference to Rystad Energy.
Russia has overtaken Qatar to become the second largest LNG supplier to Europe after the United States.
